title: Changes for Hall of Fame Game, Dak's contract, Jamal Adams trade market plus Mailbag Monday ðŸ“¬ (Football 6/29)
description:
The Pick Six Superfriends unite for discussion on trending topics around the league and to answer listener questions in a 'Monday Mailbag'. Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough react to the Hall of Fame Game getting cancelled for 2020 and what it means for the league (6:40). They also analyze the latest with Dak Prescott signing his franchise tender (14:30) plus Jamal Adams' trade request (28:15). That's followed by mailbag questions left as part of 5-star reviews on Apple Podcasts (37:00). What's the best team for a new football fan to root for? How can you get better at kicking? That's just a sampling of what Will, Ryan, John and Sean get into on this episode.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @seanjwagner, @johnbreech
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7ZUfHFsuQcW7BkTHnXJtqw?view_as=subscriber
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visitÂ https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visitÂ https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
